titles.title: To provide authority for certain debt refinancing with respect to financings approved under title V of the Small Business Investment Act of 1958, and for other purposes.
To provide authority for certain debt refinancing with respect to financings approved under title V of the Small Business Investment Act of 1958, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Finance and Tax.

bill.summary: Allows, for a two-year period, any financing approved under title V of the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 (Small Business Administration [SBA] guaranteed small business loans) to include debt refinancing relating to a conventional loan that is not SBA-guaranteed, if certain conditions are met.
